rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall integrated with an open-plan living area, designed to welcome residents according to Vastu principles (facing east or north) for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Studio Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern kitchen adjoining an informal dining space, designed with efficient layouts, integrated storage solutions, and adherence to local building norms.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet functional bathroom on the ground floor featuring local materials, ensuring privacy and Vastu compliance (placement away from main entrance).

rooms.name: Garden Entry Courtyard
rooms.description: A semi-outdoor space acting as a transition between the townhouse and its large garden, designed to embrace local flora and promote relaxation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A robust entrance featuring reinforced concrete frames and large glass panels, oriented to greet the positive energies as per Vastu (preferably north-facing).

openings.name: Balcony Access to Garden
openings.description: An open balcony connecting the living area to the garden, designed with safety features and structural integrity in mind.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A generously sized master bedroom suite including an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a private balcony designed for relaxation and adhering to Vastu by facing favorable directions.

rooms.name: Studio Work Area
rooms.description: A dedicated home office/studio area designed for work or creative pursuits, strategically placed to ensure natural light and maintain privacy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: An extra bedroom suitable for guests or family members, designed in a compact yet efficient manner, ensuring adherence to local building norms.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and an outdoor living space for relaxation. It includes minimalistic landscaping, seating areas, and safety railings.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A prominent staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed with reinforced concrete and integrated safety railings.

openings.name: Rooftop Access Ladder/Steps
openings.description: Secure access to the rooftop terrace via a well-designed staircase or ladder system ensuring compliance with local safety standards.
